snippet.title: Bloomtown - Game Reveal Trailer| PC Gaming Show 2023
snippet.description:
First revealed during the PC Gaming Show 2023, Bloomtown is a life sim where everything is not as it seems. This cozy village quickly turns dark and you'll need to fuse with frightening creatures to win turn-based battles. Read more on PC Gamer: https://www.pcgamer.com/bloomtown-reveal-trailer-pcgs-2023

www.pcgamer.com

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
